hero.title: About Darius Pizza
hero.subtitle: Discover the story behind our authentic Italian pizzeria, where tradition meets passion and every pizza tells a tale of family heritage and culinary excellence.

story.title: Our Heritage
story.description1: Founded in 1985 by Giuseppe Darius, our pizzeria began as a small family dream to bring authentic Italian flavors to our community. What started as a modest kitchen has grown into a beloved local institution, but our commitment to traditional recipes and family values remains unchanged.
story.description2: Today, three generations of the Darius family continue to craft each pizza with the same passion and attention to detail that Giuseppe brought from his hometown in Naples, Italy.
